dcterms:description: N-BaIoT is a public-domain dataset that contains both benign and attack traffic (specifically Mirai and Bashlite) of various IoT devices. It includes network traffic data collected from 9 commercial IoT devices, capturing their normal operations and behaviors, as well as the traffic generated during attacks.
dcterms:title: N-BaIoT
